page.title: 20Prison(cont.)/Credits
page.content: and responsibility. The prisoners sleep in dormitories and are expected to attend to their tasks without the formality of parades.Some are even allowed to attend colleges in the city. Morale amongst the staff is not good because of the over-crowding and subsequent lack of time and space to do a proper job. The introduction of an autonomous Prison Services would be welcomed as giving a better sense of direction to a difficult but essential sector of Public Life in the 1980's. These pages were researched and written by children from George White and Catton Grove Middle Schools Norwich. Our thanks to:Mr. Pressland Mr.Fairchild and Sprowston Parish Council,The Browns Mr Wallis Mr Ivins Mr.Horner,Mr.Weeks,Mr Mooney U C Closures,MrLey,Sprowston Middle School
